entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimize EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid #77190
    8.0.0
  • make GC's PAL implementation include the right dump info #77184
    8.0.0
  • ImmutableArray<T> struct implements IEquatable<T> interface but does not stick to the rules of properly implementing value semantics #77183
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting Rate Limiting internal queue does not check the queued request status while replenishment process #77180
  • Discussion: ObjWriter in C# #77178
  • dotnet.d.ts should be include in the wasmbrowser template #77174
  • Breaking change: Untyped Deserialize no longer forwards the type to JsonConverter<T> #77173
    7.0.0
  • JSExport did not export top-level statements #77167
  • [API Proposal]: TrimTrailingFractionalZeros for decimal #77165
  • Lack of CS0165 (Use of unassigned local variable) for DateOnly and TimeOnly types #77177
  • [Android] Package libmonosgen-2.0.so with debug symbols in the runtime pack #77161
    Future
  • MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse throws FormatException with null string #77160
  • DotNet 7 Regression when reading large Zip files #77159
    7.0.0
  • [pgo] Assert failure: (pCtx->Pc < codestart) || (pCtx->Pc >= codeend) #77156
    8.0.0
  • [pgo] windows arm/arm64 test jobs almost always timeout #77155
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] ParserTests failing on correct (displayed) values #77154
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] nullref in DefaultMode_Missing_AllMethods_ReportsDiagnostic #77153
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'unused->OperIs(GT_CNS_INT)' #77152
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 RC2 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #77150
    Future
  • asmhelpers.asm(5210) : warning A4228: Alignment value exceeds AREA alignment; alignment not guaranteed #77146
  • Test failure JIT/Stress/ABI/pinvokes_d/pinvokes_d.sh #77145
  • JIT fullpgo_random_edge crash running System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #77144
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'data->GetRegNum() != REG_WRITE_BARRIER_DST' #77143
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'data->GetRegNum() != REG_ARG_0' #77141
    8.0.0
  • HTTP/3 connection or stream shutdown is slow #77139

Closed

  • The interop source generators generate an empty file if unused. #76298
    8.0.0
  • System.AccessViolationException when using current version (68.2.0.9) of Microsoft.ICU.ICU4C.Runtime with .NET SDK v6.0.402 #77045
    6.0.x
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'next != def && "found def after use"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #77158
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.* tests #76836
    8.0.0
  • Interface Promise Comments! [API Proposal]: #77179
  • TLS 1.2 - Zero length fragment error occurs in .NET Core when spec allows it #30554
    8.0.0
  • Suboptimal codegen for UIntPtr in contrast to nuint #54463
    Future
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #43871
    Future
  • superpmicollect access violation in pgo Bytemark #76991
    8.0.0
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #43918
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 9/27/2022 12:44:07 AM #76390
  • Build fails on clean WSL machine #77168
  • dotnet pack does not respect target framework conditions #77164
  • WebSocketHandle always adds "known" request headers to connection headers even if the caller specified these themselves, duplicating entries. #73564
    8.0.0
  • JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull doesn't play well with required nullable properties #76527
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Loader/classloader/StaticVirtualMethods/RegressionTests/GitHub_71319 crashes with runtime assertion failure #71910
    8.0.0
  • JavaScript interop not marshalling Task<ArraySegment<byte>> and Task<Array> #77157
    7.0.x
  • JIT: GDV reorders null checks of 'this' with arguments #75607
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 RC1 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #76320
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Update .vsconfig file #77189
    documentation, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add missing docs for `M.E.Configuration.Xml` #77188
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate a nearly empty file #77187
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix regression when serializing untyped polymorphic root-level custom converters. #77186
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Adds `ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory<T>` API #77185
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting de-queue canceled request #77182
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77181
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • JIT: Clean up inliner substitution #77176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] interp perf to dev tools #77171
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Fix detection of weakref objects #77170
    area-GC-mono
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • Trim file type bits from mode header #77151
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Move linker to runtime #77149
    linkable-framework
  • [wasm] Fix support for debugging wasm debugger tests with VSCode #77148
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update System.Speech to Eric/Jeff #77142
    area-Meta, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fixes a wrong not node insertion producing broken lir range on macos arm64 #77166
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Swallow MSDTC availability exceptions for CI test reliability #77023
    area-System.Transactions
  • Update Strings.resx #77175
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix loading app-local ICU #77117
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • Modify __int64 definition in PAL to match the OS definition #77056
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move leap seconds DateTime configuration statics into LeapSecondCache #77163
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #76940
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: fix out of bounds read during SPMI collection #77147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Logging API doc additions #77127
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Update README.md's to use "contribution bar" #77134
    documentation, area-System.Reflection
  • Update Unix dependencies installation script #77107
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Don't check handles in substitution #76730
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix loading app-local ICU #77118
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.x
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][tests] Update instantiate_info to use mono_class_interface_offset_with_variance for interface offset #77113
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avoid runtime "atomic write" check in ConcurrentDictionary for shared generics #77005
    area-System.Collections
  • Update area-System.IO.Pipelines lead #77111
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] fix debug assert on large number of virtual methods #77106
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [IGNORE] [Experiment] Try to return MSBuild Server back. #76536
    NO-MERGE
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • statically linking GC PAL on linux #76985
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, 7.0.x
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build - Port of #75168 to main #77052
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Do not allow move and shifting with MSL on 16-bit vectors #77123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fold 'static readonly struct' to constants #77102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #77125
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: avoid LCL_FLD stress for locals that already have LCL_FLD appear… #77082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT runtime generic methods test #77079
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • SmtpClientTest Assertion Fail Fix #76361
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome for testing #77133
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update Value of TwoDigitYearMax to 2049 #76848
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT]How to fix System.NotSupportedException: Metadata for type 'Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject' was not provided by TypeInfoResolver of type '.aot.MyJsonContext' #2046
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Question: Export methods from referenced project #2045

Closed

  • [Green Threads] Unique managed thread objects/ids are not implemented #2014

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for ThreadStatic variables to the green threads implementation #2048
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge commit '4f78607507f1d189633cc320f3841c845f4f4b7f' #2047

Merged

  • Green thread objects #2023

Updated

  • Make FCall transition go through lambda that can be translated into a functionpointer + pointer arg parameter #2019

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [7.0.2xx] Change Global Property Flow to Not Flow Publish* Properties #28645
  • Error NU1012 when creating a .Net Maui app in Visual Studio 2022 ver 17.3.6 #28629

Closed

  • Mysterious new NuGet source (/usr/local/share/dotnet/library-packs) #28642

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28648
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28643
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update arcade dependency to pick up new pools and build images #28641
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Arcade to use -svc pools #28638
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix typo in tab-completion.md #28636
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Trim away FullFramework release leg #28639
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28619
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2023324 #28626
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Allow Implicit RID Opt Out + Don't Infer RID for non EXE Type Projects #28628
    Bug, Servicing-consider
  • RuntimeIdentifiers Code Coverage + Implicit RuntimeIdentifiers (not just runtimeIdentifier) #28484
    Servicing-consider, Area-ILLink
  • Return workload manifests in defined, controllable order #28627
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 7.0.0
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure workload installers can be read by other users #28608
    Area-Workloads
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • String splitter incorrectly handles multi-caret scenarios #64812
  • Sunset restricted types #64811
  • Change signature does change signatures that are not referencing the method on with the signature was changed #64809
  • newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpaddmissingreference.verifyavailablecodeactions (vs2022) #64807
  • Ref fields tests should target latest language version #64800
    17.5
  • Async taggers must override equality checks when comparing tags. #64797
  • When activating the sorting functionality, the rows under the column are not getting sorted according to the state of column header. #64794
    17.5
  • Refactoring (Extract Interface) - Allow inclusion of Doc Comments #64793
    Backlog
  • VB.NET `Convert If to Select Case` code fix bug #64787
    Backlog

Closed

  • Generate method intellisense don't generate "in" keyword in parameter(s) correctly #54212
    Backlog
  • Question: How to use syntax trees efficiently. #61797
    17.4
  • Test plan for RelaxingShiftOperator feature #60967
    17.4
  • Test plan for "required members" #57046
    17.4
  • Ref fields spec doesn't mention how scope flows from lambda to anonymous delegate types #64670
    17.5
  • SourceGenerator: A way to include files from a dependant project? #64753
    Backlog
  • Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpSourceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile is Flaky #60477
    17.4
  • Convert to LINQ produces bad code when pattern matching is involved #64798
  • InvalidProgramException when attempting to instantiate generic type via implicit operator (and generic parameter is nullable value tuple) #64777
    17.5
  • Test plan for "numeric IntPtr" #60578
    17.4
  • Inaccurate error message when attempting to use a property as a `ref` #60807
    Backlog
  • False IDE0055 (Fix formatting) reported when using multiple TargetFrameworks #62612
    Backlog
  • Compiler/analyser disagreement on `byte[]` as an unmanaged type #64792
  • Recursive lambda reference crashes nullable analysis #64599
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Semantic snippets - updates option names #64814
    Area-IDE
  • Stay on the UI thread if it's blocked waiting for us #64813
    Area-IDE
  • Move parts of official build onto new vm images #64805
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add telemetry log overload #64803
    Area-IDE
  • Implemen equality semantics for async tagger tags. #64802
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data" #64801
    Area-IDE
  • Export correct type for VisualStudioWorkpacePartialSolutionsTestHook.cs #64799
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Ensure we include a projectId along with our ProjectChanged notifications #64808
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, OnDeckForQB
  • Snippets - turn feature off by default for 17.4 #64810
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Additional tests for ref fields #64707
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • "Generate method" codefix supports 'in' parameters #64588
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Make `TargetFramework.NetCoreApp` use `Net70` #64791
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • VB: Align design around speculative semantic models with C#. #64751
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Unskip CSharpSoruceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile test #64626
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not treat `Nullable` null value as a constant for the purpose of IL generation. #64789
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64788
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Trigger background analyzer load when document open #64786
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add more symbol publishing packages to PublishData.json #64790
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Clarify error message when attempting to ref a property #64764
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Don't format regions inside inactive conditionals #64551
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix MSBuild tests and run them in CI again #64781
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Read required project properties from evaluation data #64749
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64816
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64815
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in DesignerAttributeScanning as well. #64616
    Area-IDE
  • Use ParsedDocument in more commmand handlers #63579
    Area-IDE
  • Track local constant usage in attributes applied to local methods or lambdas #64773
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64757
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Inline Hints - Make sure hints aren't returned after code has been deleted #64341
    Area-IDE
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Fix VisualStudioMSBuildInstalled attribute #64131
    Area-IDE
  • Encoding serialization #64625
    Area-Compilers
  • Out arguments do not contribute val escape #64784
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to locate repository with working directory that contains directory ... #44629
  • Routing works when started Blazor Server started from outside but now when from XUnit tests #44628
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #44627
  • [Blazor] Unexpected navigation behavior #44626
  • Blazor WebAssembly client app - enable CORS #44625
  • Link generation incorrect, either ambient values ignored or incorrect url generated #44624
  • Hosting the App on IIS cause Server URL to be Uppercase using Server Features #44622
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc]In NET 7.0.0 installation bundle help, there are a few truncated strings. #44618
  • SignalR client base on console cannot receive message from server #44617
  • [NETE2ESDK]The hotkey "a" for "I agree to the license..." on NET 7.0.0 windows server hosting installer UI doesn't work. #44616
  • [NETE2ESDK]With NET 7.0.0 windows server hosting installed, the hyperlink for "here" on installer UI is 6.0 link not 7.0 link. #44615
  • Response stops when `Response.Body.WriteAsync` is called a lot under IIS #44614
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc]The hyperlink for contents on NET 7.0.0 windows server hosting installer UI on loc OS is EN not loc link. #44613
  • Add API for Kestrel named pipes transport #44612

Closed

  • [Blazor] Add support for TimeSpan to BindConverter #17898
    Backlog
  • [Route Groups] Investigate link generation bug #41430
    7.0-rc2
  • Consider adding IPNetwork.Parse #8606
    8.0-preview1
  • RenderMode: Server First, then Wasm #27821
    Backlog
  • Server-side: handle reconnection to different server #5562
    Backlog
  • Publish .NET Core app with shared project with spaces in name. Misleading error message: net6.0\browser-wasm\ref or net6.0\win-x64\ref not found #44552
  • Blazor in WebComponent #44588
  • [Templates] Update icons in our templates #44596
  • Add support for display:content in Virtualize component #44619
  • Add support for new dialog form method in FormMethod enum #44499
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Added configureConnection delegate to CircuitStartOptions #44623
    area-blazor
  • [release/3.1] Update Grpc.AspNetCore dependency for template #44621
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 3.1.x
  • #42806 removing +1 from previous reconnection attempts #44611
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Remove IsAvailable check on CommitAsync. #44610
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix Blazor Wasm performance benchmarks #44631
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, area-perf, 8.0-preview1
  • Improve MapGroup link generation test #44562
    8.0-preview1
  • Add IPNetwork.Parse and TryParse #44573
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview1
  • Quarantine SignalR functional test "closed with error or start fails if hub cannot be created" #44609
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0-preview1
  • Adds dialog form method to FormMethod enum #44500
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [Templates] Fix links to http://useiconic.com #44597
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc

Updated

  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Update SDK #44601
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • Add more granular tests for HeaderUtilities.TryParseQualityDouble #44574
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44488
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523
    Servicing-consider
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parameter passing in shell apps doesn't work only on release mode ( android & windows ) #10771
  • [iOS] White flashy background after splash screen in MAUI Blazor #10767
  • New MAUI Blazor project should not target IOS by default #10766
  • Page.Width = -1 in Page_Loaded() in Mac Catalyst Maui #10763
  • [iOS] Issue with binaries builts compiled with VS 2022 and Xcode 14 #10760
  • Selectbox is not visible when MAUI window is running on Windows 11. #10756
  • When the flow direction is changed in ScrollView as RTL, the scrolling direction remains unchanged in iOS and macOS #10755

Closed

  • Change UseMauiEssentials to UsePlatformEssentials (or something similar) #6102
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] Add sync support to Maui SecureStorage #9204
    Backlog
  • resource raw/my_ca not found #10580
    Backlog
  • Events for headset connection status. #5000
    Backlog
  • Include support for high-Speed Bluetooth Printing and QrCode Scanning in MAUI for POS systems #9006
  • Publishing iOS MAUI App in Devops #10742
  • Navigation bar overlaps title bar when replacing MainPage for a maui Windows App #10710
  • How to display a Context Menu on a Mobile Device #10730
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Close memory stream after copy #10769
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Allow * decompression during Arrange even when target size is smaller than desired size #10768
  • Fix VerticalScrollBarVisibility not working #10765
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Move init to mapper #10751

Merged

  • [Backport] [Blazor] Fixed the openiconic link (#10749) #10764
  • Fixed the openiconic link #10749
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Backport] [Blazor] Prevent locking on packaged app content (#10744) #10750

Updated

  • iOS15 WindowStateManager Window Support #10550
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Add AppThemeColor #8839
  • Add Obsolete attribute to MessagingCenter #8765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Android] Fix Frame opacity #10672
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lazy Load Proxy loses the System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NullableAttribute from properties #29391
  • Is there a way to define a different order of inserting elements when Table-Per-Type is used? #29390
  • Migrations messing up my schema. #29389
  • Parallel requests in asp core with EF core produce FOREIGN KEY constraint conflict #29387
  • add-migration within VS Package Manager Console hangs due to Debug.Assert() (in own code) #29386
  • Query from IQueryable and Add Some Filter #29385

Closed

  • Support value tuples in CSharpHelper #29383
  • The change of a navigation to a new instance and removing the old instance throws an Exception #29356
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Support value tuples in CSharpHelper #29384
  • [release/7.0] Fix batching boundary with cycle breaking #29388
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29355 - FromSqlRaw throws Exception when querying all objects that contain a certain string property in a json array column #29366
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Proposed fix for Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560 #29346

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NETSDKE2E]Workloads are not displayed in "dotnet workload list" after upgrade from NET RC2 to NET7 RTM. #14791
  • README Out of Date #7940

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Get source-build main building #14790
  • Disable some tests that are failing because of a nuget issue on linux #14789
  • Update DarcLib, change VMR source mappings back to `.json` #14788
  • Update README.md in installer #14785

Merged

  • Switch build.sh to use dotnet msbuild vs dotnet path/to/msbuild.dll #14782

Updated

  • Eliminate portable runtime build. #14549
